title: Trick or Treat  with Tori Pool
description:
This week, Joe is joined by superstar teacher-turned-comedian, Tori Pool for a spooky Halloween episode ! Tori and Joe discuss Tori's journey from high school English teacher to full-time comedian. Then they share some hillarious Halloween hijinks sent in from the Social Studies pod nation!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
